17#include <sys/cdefs.h>
18__RCSID("$NetBSD: gettime.c,v 1.2 2016/05/17 14:00:09 christos Exp $");
19
20
21/* Written by Paul Eggert. */
22
23#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
24# include <config.h>
25#endif
26
27#include "timespec.h"
28
29/* Get the system time into *TS. */
30
31void
32gettime (struct timespec *ts)
33{
34#if HAVE_NANOTIME
35 nanotime (ts);
36#else
37
38# if defined CLOCK_REALTIME && HAVE_CLOCK_GETTIME
39 if (clock_gettime (CLOCK_REALTIME, ts) == 0)
40 return;
41# endif
42
43# if HAVE_GETTIMEOFDAY
44 {
45 struct timeval tv;
46 gettimeofday (&tv, NULL);
47 ts->tv_sec = tv.tv_sec;
48 ts->tv_nsec = tv.tv_usec * 1000;
49 }
50# else
51 ts->tv_sec = time (NULL);
52 ts->tv_nsec = 0;
53# endif
54
55#endif
56}
57
